channel.title: Python on Klnsyf

item.title: Python_init()
item.author: Klnsyf_Sun@hotmail.com (Klnsyf Sun)
item.description: // TODO 本日志包含反转义错误 [斜眼] from cmath import * from random import * minRange=1337 maxRange=11037 spreadDistance=7734 spreadSpace=917 def spreadAttempt(attempt): randomRadian=[] for index in range(attempt): randomRadian.append(random()*2*pi) legelRadian=[] for radian in randomRadian: if(abs(spreadDistance*cos(radian))maxRange or abs(spreadDistance*sin(radian))maxRange or spreadSpaceTest(radian,legelRadian)): continue else: legelRadian.append(radian) for radian in legelRadian: print(str(spreadDistance*cos(radian))+“,”+str(spreadDistance*sin(radian))) print(len(legelRadian)) def spreadSpaceTest(testRadian,radianList): for radian in radianList: if((abs(float(testRadian) - float(radian)))<abs(2*asin(spreadSpace/2/spreadDistance))): return True break return False spreadAttempt(10000)
